scripts.setup: tmux new-session -d -s packages pnpm install; tmux split-window -v pnpm run functions-npm install; tmux attach-session -t packages
scripts.update: tmux new-session -d -s packages pnpm update; tmux split-window -v pnpm run functions-npm update; tmux attach-session -t packages
scripts.upgrade: tmux new-session -d -s packages pnpm update --latest; tmux split-window -v pnpm run functions-npm update --latest; tmux attach-session -t packages
scripts.build: pnpm webpack build --config webpack.prod.js & pnpm run functions & wait
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run firebase deploy
